description.value: Your kinetic gate reaches a perfect form, its power constantly fighting to be released. If your kinetic aura is inactive, you automatically use the first action of your turn to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Channel Elements] as a free action. You can deliberately suppress the effect. If you're unable to act, final gate still functions, but you don't get to use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Elemental Blast] or stance impulse you normally do from using Channel Elements
